channel.title: Emily on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce
channel.description: Recent content in Emily on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce

item.title: Status Update – December 25, 2018
item.description: Christmas! Santa came, left candy coal for Dillan but we added a few more gifts. Indy to Grandpa Avery and Grandma Bonnie’s house after our Christmas morning. Kids got to played with lots of their cousins, had a great time! Memories. I felt sick going, during, on way back, still.

item.title: Status Update – November 22, 2018
item.description: Thanksgiving Day! Indy to Ave and Emily’s for dinner, I stopped at work for 20 minutes on way. Made record time since Hwy 69 is mostly open. Kids had great time, loved playing with cousins, they like having family. Lesa and I enjoyed ourselves as well. So much to be thankful for!
